item.title: What happens when you heat a mirror? ����
item.description: We put a mirror to the test! What happens when you heat it up, does it still reflect or does something unexpected occur?

item.title: Is fire secretly a power conductor?!
item.description: This experiment puts fire to the test! Can flames actually carry electricity?

item.title: The world‘s most dangerous greedy cup
item.description: This fascinating experiment shows the greedy cup — a mind-blowing physics trick where the cup punishes greed! Take too much, and you lose it all.

item.title: I melted wood with friction
item.description: Science experiment shows how intense friction can generate enough heat to melt wood!
